phrase: First rule of magic: always the smartest person in the room.
Oh no. Nothing, nothing's ever locked.
Without those qualities, magic as an art form would no longer exist.
What is magic? Focused deception. But deception meant to entertain.
But what happens if these qualities are not used for their higher purpose? And, instead they are used to cheat, lie.
That's because you're looking too closely. And what have i been telling you all night? The closer you look..

Like white on rice? Sorry, that's unfair. Let me warn you. I want you to follow, because no matter what you think you might know, we will always be one step, three steps, seven steps ahead of you, and just when you think you're catching up, that's when we'll be right behind you. And at no time will you be anywhere other than exactly where I want you to be. So come close, get all over me because the closer you think you are, the less you'll actually see.
When a magician waves his hand and says, 'This is where the magic happening.' The real trick is happening somewhere else. Misdirection.
